Text: By the fig and by the olive,
and by this city of peace (Makkah).
We have indeed created man in the best stature;
then We abase him to the lowest of the low
except those who believe and do good deeds - for they shall have\n\t\t\ta never ending reward.
So, what causes them to disbelieve you concerning the Day of\n\t\t\tJudgement?
Is not Allah the best of all Judges?
